content: Just make it 48 teams already. Top 16 teams have a first round bye. That results in a number of playoff games that almost exactly matches the current number of bowl games. All the bowl games could be rebranded to playoff games. No undeserving teams get left out, lots of teams get to dream of having a chance, the people who are making lots of money on the whole bowl scheme will make even more money and you don’t have a long layover between the last regular season game and the bowl game 5–6 weeks later.
